summary: A remodeled Ebony Armour to a more sexy looking armor..
descriptionHtml:
First of all I didn't make this mod , this mod was made by Stevierage

Includes textures from Dark Disciple and Shiny Catsuits with own texture paths.
includes the Boots and Gauntlets from Crosscrusades ebony armor made too fit the Bombshell body.
[b]Required:[/b]
None as Body suit textures are include and armor uses the vanilla textures (see below)
Not required but:
Any Ebony armor retexture like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37487/?]aMidianborn Ebony[/url] , [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21705/?]Dark Nemesis[/url] (used for screenshots and my favorite retext), [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25386/?]Dark Nemesis Enhanced[/url]
Why not install both the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42398//?]Dark Disciple[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41534//?]Shiny Rubber Catsuit[/url] then get the [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/20917-sevenbase-conversions-bombshellcleavage-with-bbp/]sevenbase conversions[/url] by Khiropter - [b].46[/b] and [b].47[/b].
Has weight support.
Can be crafted and tempered.
Type 'help forbidden' in console to get them the easy way.
author: Stevierage
